Name: teresa lee
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2018
Review Content: I am so happy with this Instant Pot. I have used it only for the slow cooker so far but it has gotten so much use so far. I love that I can throw my chicken and all my veggies in and let it cook for however long I want. I’ve been making bone broth, soups and anything that pops into my head. I am on a super restricted diet due to health issues and every meal has to be made fresh....no leftovers at all....so this comes in handy and saves me so much time. Plus it is super easy to use and clean. I have other crock pots but this size is perfect and it’s so easy to clean. I set the desired cooking time and then when it’s done cooking it keeps it warm.

Name: JAG
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2019
Review Content: Want to get your college kids and your busy parents the perfect gift?! The Instapot is IT! Time saving, ease of use, frozen chicken and main courses from prep to serve in less than 45 minutes-and TASTY TOO! I have cooked since I was 6 and am quite a few years older now. I used to have every implement known to the cooking world, and after cooking with the Instapot, I cannot tell you, how impressed I am. It does steel cut Quaker oats in less than 30 minutes, one of the healthiest foods you can eat. Usually this takes 6-8hours in a crock pot. Wonderful. Great gift, even for yourself!

Name: myakido
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
Review Content: I've had this pressure cooker for over a year now, but have actually only been using it sporadically over the last 8 months - and only for cooking rice, actually. Because I only used it now and then, I always referred to the booklet that stated cooking times and procedures, just to make sure nothing was left out or done wrong. After about the 4th or 5th time of cooking white rice, I noticed that the body of the pot had changed; the entire outer frame was lopsided as if bent down in the front by force. The pot still stood solid, which is why I hadn't noticed earlier I guess, and it didn't seem to affect the inside, so I have cooked rice in it about 4-5 more times. Unfortunately, despite never changing the recipe, I got the "burn" signal the last two time despite using the usual and adequate amount of water. When I shut everything off, the rice wasn't brown but white and clumpy. Stopped using it altogether now. What a piece of junk!

Name: Kerry M
Review Title: Why did I wait SO long?  ((Update: I started making Natto with this pot! LOL))
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2014
Review Content: UPDATE:  It's been almost 2 years since I bought this, still going very well.  I'm still discovering more things to make in this instant pot!  For all yogurt and/or natto (Japanese fermented beans) makers out there, get this pressure cooker if you're looking for one!Few months ago, I was introduced to food called natto by my Japanese friend, and I fell in love.  I eat natto every morning with bowl of rice now.  Who would have thought! LOL.  Despite the stinky smell, it tastes great!  How should I describe it, hmmm... it's like stinky cheese, it smells so bad but tastes soooo good!  Is it also weird that I taste hint of coffee bean in the natto??  Well, it does for me, and I love it!Anyways, I eat so much natto now, I started making it after researching and getting recipe on the internet.  You need pressure cooker and a warmer (like yogurt maker) to make natto, and this instant pot has both features.  I love it!!So all you natto lovers out there, try making natto at home with organic, non-gmo soybeans, and get this instant pot.  Also, talk about all the health benefits of natto!  Go google it, you'll be surprised how good it does to your body.I wanted this for so long!  But I was concerned if I would use it often enough to make my moneys worth.  So I waited like a year debating weather I should or shouldn't buy it.  I didn't want to buy it mostly because I had slow cooker at home sitting in cablinet only to come out once or twice a year during cold seasons, and thought this pressure cooker will do the same.  WRONG!!!! Wow.. I so regret waiting so long to buy this!  I use it at least once a week!  I'm having so much fun cooking with this pressure cooker.  If you are like me and wondering, DON'T.  Just buy it, and you'll know what to do with it almost every week if not everyday.

Name: just sayin
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2019
Review Content: This is my second instant pot. I originally bought the 8 quart and it's too large for the counter or even handy tuck away storage even though I very often cook large batches and freeze.  This mini (3 quart) is nice for on the counter and perfect for a dinner for 2. My favorite part is I really like the control panel selection.  I have not used the yogurt setting yet but I'm hoping it will hold many of my fermented beans and legumes at a steady low temp for 24 hours which I have seen on you tube but will have to verify it in my own kitchen. Last night I concocted a great black bean turkey chili and the settings were easy to use and it turned out perfect. Excellent size for  tuck-away or counter top.

Name: R & A Johnson
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
Review Content: We have used electronic countertop pressure cookers for over a decade, and the Instant Pot brand is simply the best. I was originally attracted to it because of the stainless steel liner, and there were replacement parts available. Previous pressure cookers had teflon-coated aluminum liners, which lasted under two year and O-rings that gave out and quit sealing after a couple of years.  Our current Instant Pot is over five years old and still going strong. I got a spare O-ring, but I haven’t needed it yet.We have bought and Instant Pot for each of our children. Now, there is a growing line of accessories to make things easier and cook specialized dishes. It just keeps getting better.

Name: crabboy
Review Title: Perfect for quick one pot meals
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2018
Review Content: Ho il piatto istantaneo da alcuni mesi ormai. All'inizio, l'ho usato alcune volte e poi è rimasto inutilizzato per alcune settimane dopo alcuni errori e messaggi di masterizzazione. Dopo aver sperimentato un po 'e trovato alcune buone ricette, l'IP viene utilizzato molto ora. A volte tutti i giorni feriali per settimane. Ci vuole un po 'per abituarsi e con questa conoscenza diventa più facile identificare le ricette che funzioneranno bene, essere in grado di modificare ricette e porzioni. Per lo più scelgo le soluzioni one pot quando non ho bisogno di hassel e velocità. La pentola non è molto più veloce di molte delle cose che cucino durante la settimana, pasta, pollo, riso, poiché ci vuole molto tempo per creare pressione, ma per lo più le mani sono libere dopo aver chiuso il coperchio.

Name: terrificante
Review Title: Cena pronta in men che non si dica!
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​19 dicembre 2017
Review Content: Non sono sicuro di dove sono stato, o perché non ho sentito parlare di questo vaso molto prima d'ora. Pentola in acciaio inossidabile di ottima qualità. All'inizio ero un po 'intimidito a causa delle storie dell'orrore delle vecchie pentole a pressione che sono esplose o hanno causato brutte ustioni. Questa pentola ha oltre 10 funzioni di sicurezza in atto .. se non metti il ​​coperchio a destra, non creerà vapore. se la pentola contiene pressione, il coperchio non può essere aperto finché non viene rilasciata tutta la pressione. ADORO questo piatto !. regalo di natale anticipato e già cucinato un rack di costolette in 30 minuti che è caduto dall'osso, e stasera ho provato un manzo alla strogganoff che era una delizia! era preoccupato che i noodles non cuocessero bene, ma erano perfetti.Non avevo bisogno di una padella per cuocere la carne, e una padella per la pasta e un colino per le tagliatelle, NOPE !!! tutti cotti nella stessa pentola. la pentola ha un pulsante per rosolare le carni o saltare le verdure, il più grande svantaggio è dover capire quanta acqua per ogni tipo di prodotto stai cucinando e quantità che stai cucinando e quanto tempo. basta andare online e digitare ricette istantanee e ne avrai migliaia da provare. Con il tempo sono sicuro che diventerà una seconda natura. non l'ho ancora provato, ma puoi cucinare un pollo intero congelato in circa un'ora! è stupefacente. Non riesco nemmeno a immaginare come questo possa aiutare le mamme lavoratrici che tornano a casa e cenano per cucinare. Risparmia tempo e denaro perché invece di cuocere le costine in forno per diverse ore, è stato fatto in 30 min., Risparmierò anche soldi extra quando non sto riscaldando la casa con i fornelli accesi, mentre l'aria condizionata è in funzione. È anche una pentola di coccio e ha la funzione di avvio ritardato. Consiglia di controllare le domande di revisione in quanto risponde a molte domande normali e di controllare alcune delle ricette online per vedere quanto possono essere semplici. Altamente raccomandato

Name: Walter Guilarte
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​11 agosto 2020
Review Content: Questo è il nostro secondo vaso istantaneo. Il nostro primo è stato fantastico, ma abbiamo deciso di prenderne uno più grande. Tuttavia, la nostra unica grande delusione è stata che i fagioli e le lenticchie che abbiamo cucinato sono usciti secchi e duri. Ti danno una tabella di quanto di fagioli, lenticchie, ecc. Usare, ma la quantità di acqua che devi mettere nella pentola è in lettere minuscole che non abbiamo visto quell'informazione per molte settimane. Non riuscivamo a capire perché uscissero secchi e duri anche se abbiamo usato la quantità di acqua che abbiamo usato nell'altra pentola istantanea. Quindi ora stiamo usando la quantità di acqua per la quantità di prodotto che suggeriscono, e ancora non sta uscendo bene. Dovremo sperimentare fino a quando non riusciremo a ottenere le giuste proporzioni. Non dovrebbe essere così.

Name: Usha
Review Title: Deve articolo se cucini tutti i giorni
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​31 dicembre 2020
Review Content: Questo è il nostro terzo piatto istantaneo. Altri due sono un po 'grandi per la cucina di tutti i giorni. Questa è la dimensione perfetta per 4 persone. Cuoce il riso in 4 minuti. Lo usiamo anche per cuocere verdure e daal. Cuoce tutto molto velocemente.

Name: OclaOruid
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​22 dicembre 2017
Review Content: I love food cooked in earthen pots, as it keeps the food warm, not hot. The food tastes much better, for a number of reasons. One of the criteria is use to check if the food is cooked healthy is by checking the time taken for the cooked food to start decaying. Anything cooked in earthen pot stays fresh a bit longer, than food cooked in metal containers. Why do I bring this up in this review. Well, this thing cooks food almost as is it were cooked in an earthen pot.I have lived my life cooking rice in pressure cookers and why I dot like the texture, it's convenient and it's fast. The down side of it, is the rice gets compacted. Rice when cooked shouldn't stick to each other, as if it's glued together. When you take rice out of s pressure cooker, you only get baked cakes.This thing cooks rice almost to perfection. Wonder what the magic is.I have been using this for the last 3 months and I can't be more happier than this.I haven't used this to cook Dhal, but I'm assuming it will be good as well

Name: OdinSon
Review Title: Amazing product! Buy the book though
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2020
Review Content: My wife had been asking for one for a while. I finally, after a month of research went with this one. It has been amazing! I want expecting much, but this thing really does it all! Saves on dishes, time, work and cooks nice and evenly. I strongly recommend the how to instapot cookbook though. It can be complicated to use at first and the directions that come with the pot are pretty bad.

Name: Skywalker20877
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2019
Review Content: We have used the Instant Pot DUO60 (6-Quart) for about a year. We love it! You can cook delicious meals in minutes (seriously 15-30 minutes). It saves time and electricity, compared to using the oven or cooktop and the meals are more delicious. Clean up is easy too, just wash the stainless steel inner pot and the lid, wipe down the rest and your done.We bought this 8-Quart, which is the same as our 6-Quart, because when we have guests we needed to make more food and sometimes we cook two different dishes at the same time using both Instant Pots. I like to eat a whole lot more than I like to cook, and I couldn't be happier with the Instant Pots.

Name: W.M.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2018
Review Content: If you do most of the cooking in your household then this thing will be life changing for you! No more do you have to plan meals the day before and get them in the slow cooker early to allow them to cook all day. Dinner plans can be decided last minute now! This was our first time using a pressure cooker so it was a little intimidating at first but that all changed after the first time using it. You can google "instant pot recipes" and come up with plenty of great recipes and ideas for dinner. Most of the recipes walk you through the entire process step by step, button by button, so it takes the guess work out of learning how to use the Instant Pot. Most recipes can all be done in the same pot which makes clean up an easy task. Also if you like to meal prep, this thing could save you a lot of time. After using this a couple of times, this was our Christmas present to many of our family members, its that good!!! So if you haven't already, buy one of these and see what all the hype is about! You'll thank yourself later ;-)

Name: Dave
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2017
Review Content: Gifted to someone because I have one and really enjoyed it - even though they can have some quirks which deducted one star.They can be finicky when it comes to the pressure valves. I had to manually manipulate mine because the steam would not build. I stuck a knife into the smaller stem and wiggled it until it sealed. Then the main pressure valve would leak steam so I moved it ever so slightly until it stopped leaking. It was able to get it sealed, but was definitely not "Set it and forget it." I've had others receive a new lid from the company but it was not something that was simple. They had to provide photos, speak with customer service more than once. I mention this because before I even got mine, I read the same issues with several people and think that Instant Pot should just own that there are issues which come up from time to time. Don't make people jump through hoops - it's not a replacement lid comes with a free, real diamond ring for the customer. I will update if I have more issues, but I'm hoping this doesn't disqualify me from getting my free diamond ring if I need one.

Name: Dima
Review Title: Easy to clean and cook with!
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
Review Content: It is the perfect pot for college students, really. It cooks my meals in less that 30 minutes, unless the recipe indicates otherwise. the rice is perfect every time, and best of all I can just dump the food in it as is and the meal turns out perfect! I know how to cook but this instant pot makes cooking practically nothing.the only downside is that the 3q  is kind of too small for my needs, but that is my bad I was hesitating if I should get the 3qrt or the 6qrt. For reference, one Cornish hen would sit comfortably inside a 3qrt but I don't know if a whole chicken would unless you cut it into quarters.

Name: Gina
Review Title: 6qt middle of the line, good quality for the money.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2018
Review Content: Good pot for the price paid ($80). Don't need all the functions now but maybe later? Its a good way to get meals cooked but, I don't completely agree with not soaking lentils and beans... It's part of the ancient process for some foods to be prepared the way they are traditionally prepared. When we cooked lentils without soaking, the shells didn't break down and while it was cooked, texture wasn't there.6 quarts is enough for three people and three left over meals. I don't know how much you eat but, we are athletic and eat average sized meals.The pot takes four minutes to preheat before you actually get to pressure cooking, it will cook lentils in 3min but you have to build the pressure first.Great for rice dishes and stews. Sauté function is useful. Don't eat milk so yogurt function is not for me. And I live in the desert so fresh fruit is always available year round and I have no need to can items.Still trying to figure out the timing so that the meal doesn't come out like baby food when I include sweet potatoes.Need to buy the stacking clay pots.This model is good for the money if you keep it clean and running smooth. The rubber gasket is getting stained but if you wash it, it prevents  build up. I can see how the inner stainless steel pot might fail first after years of use. So far it's good.I would probably buy the more basic model to save some money next time. I don't need the extra functions.Im sure there are better pots out there but this works for us.Godere!

Name: Joyce Lochhead
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​22 aprile 2020
Review Content: Se non hai un vaso istantaneo, devi procurartene uno !! Questo piatto è stato un acquisto del Black Friday ad un ottimo prezzo. Ho usato almeno 3 volte a settimana da quando è arrivato. Entrambi amiamo quanto sia facile usare e adattare le nostre ricette preferite con l'aiuto di video e ricette online. L'articolo è arrivato in tempo e come descritto. È arrivato con una semplice guida con i tempi di cottura e un libretto di istruzioni, ma vai online per guardare i video per idee sull'uso e ricette. Instant Pot ha anche un ottimo sito Web e ti aiuterà a imparare come utilizzare il loro meraviglioso prodotto. Consiglio vivamente questo Instant Pot Duo. Facile da usare e molte idee per ricette disponibili nelle comunità di Instant Pot su una varietà di social media.

Name: J-NYC
Review Title: Eccellente per un cuoco alle prime armi!
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​25 novembre 2019
Review Content: Volevo qualcosa che potessi fare lotti di buon cibo sano da congelare e anche da portare al lavoro, l'unico problema che ho è con il senno di poi vorrei aver comprato il 6qt in modo da poterlo fare di più in un unico cuoco.

Name: Bella
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​8 febbraio 2021
Review Content: Non ho molti soldi ma dopo aver sentito e letto di questa macchina per anni e nove su dieci dicono quanto sia fantastica. Devo essere d'accordo ora dopo averlo usato dozzine di volte. Adoro cucinare un mozzicone di maiale che risulta fantastico. se trovi dei contanti usa e getta, consiglio vivamente questa macchina. Sono disabile e avevo davvero bisogno di trovare un aiuto nella mia cucina, questo è venuto in soccorso. Vorrei solo che vendessero il coperchio della friggitrice ad aria per adattarlo al mio, li vendono ma solo per una taglia. Penso che una miniera da sei quarti è otto dopo aver usato una friggitrice ad aria che un amico mi ha dato sarebbe fantastico averne una che si adatti al mio instapot

Name: Idraulico maestro
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​8 gennaio 2018
Review Content: The wife 'had' to have one of these(because all of her friends had recently gotten them)When they were on sale for Christmas, I gave in(We already have 3 crock pots and never use any of them)Fast forward 3 weeks, and it was still sitting on the counter un-used.So, to keep from taking a sledge hammer to it, I decided to try it out.(maybe that was her plan all along.....)I am not a fan of traditional 'crock pot type meals'!!!!!(too many pot lucks when I was growing up)I have to say - this thing is pretty amazing and I am glad we got it.  Even if I am the one that has to use it.  I've made 3 meals so far, and every one has been delicious.  Even our picky 5 year old liked them!(he normally survives strictly on chicken nuggets)2 things to know......1.  Prep time is usually 30min - 1hr for most meals2.  It takes 10-20min to reach temp and pressurize before the cook time starts, and another 5 - 20min to cool and de-pressurize.So,  if the recipe says 5min cook time = 30min real timeStill, I cooked a 2.5lb pork roast in 1 hour (plus 15min warm up and 15min cool down)

Name: Susan  Cress
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2018
Review Content: This is my 3rd Instant Pot.  I already have the 6-Quart and the 8-quart  I bought another Mini for my sister as a gift, as she has a 6-quart also.We are now "pot heads". (People who go on about how they love their Instant Pots)  It is important that there is the Yogurt setting, as I do cultured foods such as Natto and Amazake.  (I have a batch of natto in my 3 Qt now.)I made a huge pot of bone broth in the 8 Qt--letting it slow cook for 24 hours. The richest beef broth I had ever made.  I used to hate peeling hard boiled  eggs. Now, its 5 minutes to cook, 5 minutes to rest, and the shells come right off smoothly, not leaving any nicks in the eggs. I could go on, but the bottom line is you can't go wrong with an Instant Pot.

Name: kagy
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2019
Review Content: Yeah, I love it.  I know so many people who have these now, and literally every one of them loves it!  Like 5 star loves it!  It's really well built and should last a lifetime.  I did have one teeny issue - that little condensation catcher they provide fits into a receptacle that has some tiny little "wings" to hold it in place.  Those wings are the most flimsy part of this unit, and breaking one off is entirely too easy!  I did it.  Luckily that catcher isn't really all that important, so you could go without it, or put it in place with some double sided Velcro if you really thought it was necessary.  I was actually able to repair it with super glue, but that was pure luck.

Name: Lex's mom
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2018
Review Content: I am having some difficulty with this pot. I want to love it, but it keeps failing me. First, as a slow cooker, I've just about written it off. It never gets hot enough, and even on high for 8-9 hrs, it will not slow cook a chicken for me. In my ancient crockpot (that finally fell apart) it would be falling off the bone in 4-5 hrs. So then I tried pressure cooking more often. My meat doesn't seem to be tender enough, but at least it's cooked. Until today. Today the pot acted like it was working, I heard the thing come up to pressure, but when I went to serve dinner, the chicken was still raw! I don't know why, because the pot came to pressure and started counting down the time, then released the pressure naturally. At a loss. Don't know if I have a dud??

Name: Angie
Review Title: I am a huge Instant Pot fan
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2017
Review Content: This is my third one, and this time I'm happy! So easy to handle. It has replaced my slowcooker completely, and warms up leftovers so much better than the microwave! Especially frozen ones. Perfect yogurt. Beans in 1/2 hour from dry: great for a quick batch of hummus!It'll be nice when accessories become more available, like spare silicone seals, stackable pot-in-pot, etc...I believe the IP can pay for itself eventually, by saving on utilities. We used our pressure cooker twice a day when I was growing up in post-war Europe for that reason.And I want to thank the CEO for listening to customers. It shows.

Name: Liza
Review Title: Mini Duo Mini 3 Quart: Works Well For Me. Great for Small Family & Those on a Diet
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2018
Review Content: Love this Mini Instant Pot.  It does what its supposed to do, and occupy very little counter space. It's my go to for quick, small meal preparation and I'm glad I purchased it.  I deducted a star because I wished it was easier to clean-Food sticks to the bottom and needs to be soaked to be removed.I do highly recommend the Mini if you have a small family, on a diet, or just being careful about the overuse of oils and butters in your foods.

Name: Simplyblessed
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2019
Review Content: Inizialmente ho adorato questo vaso quando l'ho preso. Si è cotto velocemente e in modo uniforme. Tuttavia, dopo il 1 ° mese l'ugello per selezionare lo sfiato o lo sfiato continua a muoversi. Non lo farei sfiatare per la cottura a pressione e poi si sposterà lentamente per sfiatare in pochi minuti e il vapore uscirà ... rovinando il mio cibo. Ora devo stare vicino in modo da poterlo tornare a nessuna ventilazione che può essere pericoloso perché il vapore è estremamente caldo e può bruciare. Sono davvero deluso.

Name: Natalie
Review Title: Non tanto istantaneo quanto alla fine ... ma ne vale la pena
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​18 novembre 2017
Review Content: In verità, è davvero un "Eventually Pot". Ho preparato un risotto ai piselli / funghi con una striscia di pancetta tagliata per il mio viaggio inaugurale. Ecco come funziona la pentola istantanea: fai soffriggere le cose che devono essere saltate (funghi, cipolle,) nella sua modalità saute. Quindi lo accendi. E poi, per i principianti, setacciate Internet e i libri per vedere perché non funziona. Dopo circa 15 minuti inizia a sibilare e finalmente vedete che il tempo di cottura di 6 minuti è acceso.Dopo 6 minuti hai una scelta: puoi lasciarlo riposare fino a quando il vapore non si è esaurito e poi aprire e mangiare (Natural Pressure Release). OPPURE puoi rilasciare il vapore che sibila e schizza fino al soffitto (è qui che sei grato di non averlo messo sotto i banconi di legno). Poi, quando ha finito il suo lungo sibilo, ti dà il via per aprire la pentola e servire. Quindi --- la prossima volta mi rilasserò e non mi mangerò le unghie mentre aspetto che faccia il suo dovere. La prossima volta inizierò prima e lascerò che il vapore si disperda da solo - Rilascio naturale. Eventually Pot è una buona idea per combinare zuppe e cassarole e cose del genere. Una volta che sei abituato ai suoi modi e ti rendi conto che il 6Il tempo di cottura minuto include circa 30-45 minuti di cinta dei lombi e sciolto i lombi, vedo che può fare un buon lavoro. Se non fossi stata una Nellie nervosa, mi sarei seduto con un libro e mi sarei rilassato. È quello che farò la prossima volta, che probabilmente sarà domani. Il risotto? Molto bene; non molliccio. Cucinato perfettamente. Consistenza perfetta. Il tempo effettivo impiegato per mescolare il risotto è stato una frazione minuscola del tempo impiegato per preparare il risotto in modo tradizionale.

Name: Flexo
Review Title: Deluso. Inferiore per la maggior parte delle cose rispetto ai metodi convenzionali.
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​29 luglio 2020
Review Content: Acquistato principalmente come cuociriso e per stufati e simili. È davvero inferiore per tutte le funzioni. Il riso fallisce ogni volta con un ciuffo duro di riso semi-bruciato sul fondo. Gli stufati non sono diversi dalla cottura su un fornello. Forse è un po 'più veloce ma poiché è tutto sigillato non puoi aggiustare spezie e sale e come si cucina come puoi con una pentola che puoi scoprire. Questo è per le persone pigre a cui non piace cucinare o insaporire i loro cibi. Letteralmente nulla è migliorato da questo dispositivo se non il risparmio di un po 'di tempo. L'ho provato molto quando l'ho preso per la prima volta ... "sindrome del nuovo giocattolo" ma diversi mesi dopo è seduto nell'armadio inutilizzato e probabilmente sta andando al garage in attesa di una svendita o qualcosa del genere. Molto deluso.

Name: Pat M
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2020
Review Content: No user guide wth product. Had to buy several books in order to figure out how it worked and what  the control buttons were for. Have not had it very long and only used 1 time w/lousy results. I think I will really like this product once I get more familiar with it.  Within the last week found a site that gives you COMPLETE instructions, tips ect run by a wonderful women on Pinterest w/lots of great easy recipes. (Margin making mom)

Name: Phil in Magnolia
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2017
Review Content: The Consumer Reports Review of This Instant Pot Finally Convinced Me to Get One

Name: LG
Review Title: I resisted but now I love it
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2020
Review Content: I'm probably the last person on earth to get one of these things because I'm not into fads. It was the fact that I could supposedly make yogurt in large batches that ultimately won me over. And it's true, you CAN make yogurt in large batches with this one, although I'm still experimenting (1/2 gallon batches come out perfect, 1 gallon batches seem  thin...I'm messing with variables to try to determine if it's temperature fluctuations, more innoculant needed or what). You can make other stuff too and I've used it for various things. LOVE the relatively quick cooking of things that usually take hours. Rice comes out perfect. Lots of reasons to recommend this. It's particularly great for making a couple of meals for the week ahead that can be eaten all week.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2020
Review Content: I was initially afraid to use this because of the steam release process. Old pressure cookers would sometimes explode if the pressure got too great and I guess that was in my mind when I got this. Since then I've gotten over my fears and it is now my go-to cooker! I make yummy yogurt, my first successful pot roast with veggies, pinto beans in a fraction of the time it used to take. What's not to like?? Wish it came with a few recipes, but the internet is full of them, so that's minor. Buy one, especially when they are on sale, and you'll never look back!

Name: TuckerReviewer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2019
Review Content: My wife has been loving cooking in this since we got it, and has been very happy with it from day one. Small learning curve, but it didn't take long to replace the crock pot for almost everything. It cooks faster in general, you can still slow cook if you want, and it allows cooking things easily that were otherwise not worth the trouble (getting ribs tender with this was actually successful, a nice change for us).Only caveats are that for our family size, the 8 Qt might have been better. Even with fewer people, the bigger one can be handy for cooking larger amounts at times. But the price difference was significant at the time.One part failed early on and was replaced under warranty. Only other issue was when it was dropped on a trip, and got a noticeable dent in the side that separated it at the bottom. Didn't harm the pressure chamber at all, and I was able to take it apart and straighten it out enough to fit in the base properly again.Very happy with it, would be a top priority to replace if it every failed.

Name: Jbug
Review Title: This experienced PC user is SOLD!!
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2017
Review Content: I resisted purchasing an electric pressure cooker for years. I've used stove top models for the past 25 years and I've always felt like they were adequate and it was not necessary to buy of these new-fangled multi-function showboats!  However I purchased the Instant Pot in the 6-qt model for a friend of mine, who doesn't do a lot of cooking and is a very busy working mother of two busy kids. I thought that this would help her to prepare quick, nutritious, easy meals for her family. When I got a good look at it, I decided to purchase the 8-quart model for myself to give it a go. I cannot tell you how happy I am that I broke down and bought it. This appliance is so much simpler to use. I can actually drink my wine while preparing my meals when using this. No more intense thinking about the best method for each entree or remembering to set timers (how long has it been at full pressure????), which is good for this middle-aged woman who has a healthy red wine habit and advanced multiple sclerosis (memory is not my forte).  I have made numerous dishes, mostly utilizing the PC function, combined with the saute function beforehand.  The greatest thing about this PC/multi-function appliance is how simplistic it is when compared to its (ancient) cousin, the stovetop pressure cooker.  Despite telling myself for years that my stovetop PCs (I have 3 of them) could do everything that the new electric models could do, it takes much more effort and there is a steeper learning curve. After using them for years, there was still the occasional scorched ingredients in the bottom of the cooker.  No more.  Yes, I know, you can use the PIP method. But that significantly decreases the capacity of your PC. You have to find a heatproof bowl/ casserole dish that fits into the PC and still holds a decent amount of food. I've made curries, pulled pork, numerous breakfast recipes, and all have turned out fantastic.  My stovetop models are still useful but this is my go-to cooker.  I can use the stovetop models I have to "bake" potatoes, quick steam veggies, hard boil eggs, etc while main dishes are cooking in the new Instant Pot.  Other advantages:1.  You only need a power supply to use it.  If you have a huge group at your home, it can go in the next room (in my case, the laundry room) and free up my cooktop and counter space.2.  It is silent.3.  There is NEVER anything scorched on the bottom.  The only time I use the PIP method is when I am putting something in ramekins or dessert pans such as springform pans, etc.4.  Non-PC users are no longer terrified in my kitchen.  I am sold!

Name: Jordan P.
Review Title: Waste of money, does not work
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2019
Review Content: TOTAL GARBAGE.  I am a professional chef and this thing is garbage.  The slow cook mode can’t get hot enough to actuallly slow cook. The pressure modes are all inconsistent and great mushy uneven textures.  I wish I could have returned the garbage.

Name: C. Hoffman
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2019
Review Content: You do not want to fire up a stove.  This kept me fed last year when we were in the middle of one of the worst heatwaves and my a/c died.  No way was I going to fire up a stove to cook dinner.  After the big roof top a/c unit was replaced I still wasn't going to fire up the stove.  That 'energy efficient" a/c unit is still an electricity hog.  The Instant Pot is kinder to the utility bill.It's other function is to feed my 17 year old Miniature Pinscher.  I make his food in this pot, hit it with a stick blender and he gets healthy dog food (yes, he gets a vitamin and mineral supplement). No unhealthy fillers like cellulose (found in a so called healthy dog food recommended by vets).  My dog has really responded to his Instant Pot meals.  How many 17 year old dogs can trot freely and like to play?Mangio molti fagioli e cereali. Questa pentola mi permette di mangiare cereali integrali e fagioli che non sono stati macinati oltre il riconoscimento. Le carni sono più spremute e posso preparare il cibo per una settimana a pranzo e cena. (Divertente, se mangi un pranzo molto salutare, non hai davvero voglia di fare il maiale a cena). Ci provo anche il pane.

Name: Signor Bert
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​8 febbraio 2018
Review Content: Inizierò dicendo che il piatto istantaneo 8QT è stato migliore di quanto mi aspettassi. A differenza di alcune recensioni, ho trovato i controlli molto facili da usare. L'unità è stata imballata molto bene ed è arrivata in perfette condizioni. Anche il disimballaggio è stato molto semplice. Dopo aver lavato la ciotola e fatto il test iniziale dell'acqua, sono saltato dentro e ho preparato una zuppa di verdure per il viaggio inaugurale. Ho usato l'impostazione della zuppa per una zuppa di verdure toscana, è stata riscaldata e sotto pressione in circa 6 minuti. Il tempo di cottura era di 30 minuti ed è stato utilizzato un rilascio istantaneo. Le verdure erano cotte alla perfezione. La pulizia è stata molto semplice. Mi sono tuffato in un filetto di maiale. Usando la funzione saute ho rosolato il maiale e poi 2 cipolle. Utilizzando l'impostazione manuale per 15 minuti, quindi un rilascio di 10 minuti e 5 minuti di riposo, il maiale era assolutamente tenero. Una volta dei filetti più gustosi che abbia mai avuto. La pulizia è stata di nuovo molto semplice. Sono molto soddisfatto del mio acquisto e ho intenzione di utilizzarlo per verdure in lotti, zuppe e arrosti per più giorni. Ottimo acquisto, migliore del previsto.

Name: prettygeek
Review Title: Controlla per assicurarti che ogni funzione funzioni!
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​24 ottobre 2014
Review Content: Il primo che ho ricevuto aveva solo pochi pulsanti funzionanti e non funzionava con nessuna impostazione a bassa temperatura. L'ho restituito e il secondo funziona alla grande, motivo per cui l'ho valutato con quattro stelle. Ma assicurati di controllare ogni funzione il prima possibile dopo averlo ricevuto o potresti rimanere bloccato! Ero quasi troppo tardi per cambiarlo. (Ho letto anche altri revisori che hanno affermato di avere problemi simili con unità non funzionanti, motivo per cui ho voluto testare ogni funzione. Questo richiede certamente diverse ore.) Oltre a questo, rende il riso integrale perfetto e soffice, anche se non con il preset pulsante di riso. (Il pulsante del riso è solo per il normale riso bianco.) Ho pensato che la pentola in acciaio inossidabile potesse essere un problema durante la pulizia dopo aver usato la funzione pentola a pressione, ma non lo è. Complessivamente, Mi piacciono molto le varie funzioni in quanto ne ha reso un po 'più facile anche l'uso da parte di mio marito. Trovo, tuttavia, che entrambi abbiamo bisogno del manuale per ricordare come utilizzarlo per le nostre ricette, poiché molti non sono conformi ai pulsanti delle funzioni preimpostate. Inoltre, devo ricordarmi di stare molto attento quando rilascio il vapore per farlo molto lentamente ed evitare di raggiungere direttamente l'unità (che è il mio primo istinto), altrimenti vengo rimproverato. Tuttavia, lo comprerei di nuovo senza esitazione.

Name: Cliente Kindle
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​5 novembre 2017
Review Content: Ho una lunga storia di desiderio di gadget perché ne ho sentito parlare molto e sono nuovi e brillanti. Ho trattenuto a lungo l'acquisto della pentola istantanea perché avevo una pentola a cottura lenta e una cuociriso, ma alla fine ho ceduto e ne ho comprata una. È stupefacente. Ho iniziato lentamente, con costolette e patate dolci. La mia ossessione ha preso una marcia in più quando ho comprato il nuovo libro di cucina di Melissa Clark, Dinner in an Instant. Zuppe di fagioli secchi pronte in meno di un'ora! Deliziose zuppe e stufati di pollo! L'ho usato almeno due volte a settimana con risultati sorprendenti. Allora perché mi piace quando la mia pentola a cottura lenta ha raccolto polvere per anni? È così semplice e veloce! - Le ricette della pentola a cottura lenta tendono ad essere insipide e pastose. Non così con il piatto istantaneo. Semmai, il sapore è più concentrato.- La mia pentola a cottura lenta è in ceramica pesante ed è difficile e scomoda da pulire. Il rivestimento per pentole istantaneo è leggero e si raffredda rapidamente, quindi posso pulirlo prima che il cibo si asciughi e si attacchi. - Inoltre, non sono una persona mattiniera e l'ultima cosa che voglio fare dopo essermi svegliato è preparare carne cruda e tritare le cose per la cena. Con il piatto istantaneo, inizio la cena quando torno a casa dal lavoro ed è pronta, di solito entro un'ora e senza un monitoraggio costante.Poter saltare nella stessa pentola è fantastico anche per aggiungere sapore. Non ho provato la preparazione dello yogurt, ma non vedo l'ora di provarla. Ignoro la maggior parte dei preset e mi baso sul manuale. Ora mi converto all'istante e non riesco a smettere di delirarne con amici e familiari. Se ottieni una pentola istantanea, fatti un favore e prendi anche il libro di cucina di Melissa Clark. Se sei un buongustaio, adorerai le sue ricette. Non sono stato ancora deluso.

Name: Katie A
Review Date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il ​​17 giugno 2017
Review Content: I love this pressure cooker! I debated giving it four stars instead of five because there are some things I wish were different on it (like how much you can fill it and some easier more family friendly recipes in the recipe book) but in all honesty it's been nothing but good to me in producing amazing meals and tender meat!Something I wish someone had explained to me so I'll put it in my review:So many recipes call for huge amounts of meat (3-4lb) but my family is small so we only need 1-2lbs so I assumed less time is needed for the pressure cooker (I use the manual setting the most) but turns out meat will come out tender after cooking for LONGER. The heat cooks the meat quickly then the pressurized heat helps break down the tendons between the muscle of the meat making it "fall off the bone" tender. So if a recipe says cook a 4lb roast for 80-90 min and you get a smaller cut or meat, stick to the same time and you won't be sorry!

Name: Walter T
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2019
Review Content: I love that i could saute or brown meat without changing pans or pots. I mostly use saute, meat, pressure, slow cook and manual setting. During pressure, the cover sturdily locks the whole pot and does not let you open it if there is still pressure. It has a pleasant sound when you lock it. All the recipe i tried for instapot were simply delicious, cook book not included. I dislike the part when i have to let the pressure out bec the steam moistens the area around it with droplets of broth or soup. Probably because i tend to overfill. It is easy to clean the steel pot. A little hassle to clean the cover, rubber ring and the sides of the pot being too narrow.  It is big enough to feed a party.

Name: Buddhamouse
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2021
Review Content: Arrived without a power cord.  IP was going to ship me one on 12/28  1/8 and still not shipped.  So It's great to store my coffee beans in and looks impressive on the counter.  It would be nice to actually use it!  Since I had no cord and IP is slack in responding I had to return it.

Name: Cool Joe
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2020
Review Content: Absolutely love it.  The number of buttons is a little daunting at first.  If you have someone who is good at using it, have them show you what to do.  We love the yogurt function.  We cook whole frozen chickens with the 1 hour setting (you have to also add to that hour the heatup and depressurize time).  All of the meats fall of the bone, and bones get very very soft.  Get a spare gasket if you make meats or seasoned items and you plan to make yogurt.  The gaskets absorb garlic, rosemary, and meat smells, and they get into your yogurt if you don't have a seperate gasket that you reserve only for yogurt.  I would only trust the gaskets from the manufacturer's website, and their prices and shipping are very reasonable.

Name: BinaryCode
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
Review Content: Verified Purchase

Name: kgb
Review Title: Cooks rice good enough for even the most demanding
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2019
Review Content: My wife comes from a rice loving culture and was missing having a proper rice cooker like is standard in her home country. Most of the cookers that are comparable to what she wanted were as or more expensive than this machine. The first time she made rice with this she was amazed and overcome with joy at both the quality of the rice (rice is rice to me so hard for me to judge) and how quickly it was made. The fact that this machine can be used for so many things yet is so good at even a less common function like cooking rice it awesome. Get it, you will not be disappointed (unless you get one too small :p)

Name: Ziegler
Review Title: Works great until it doesn't, just barely past the 1 year warranty
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2020
Review Content: Possiedo questo vaso istantaneo da 18 mesi. Anche se l'ho avuto, ha funzionato benissimo con un uso abbastanza regolare. Di recente, quando stavo usando la funzione saute per rosolare alcune cipolle prima di aggiungere i fagioli alla cottura a pressione, ha semplicemente smesso di funzionare. Il pannello di controllo si è appena spento. Ho provato a collegarlo ad altre prese per assicurarmi che non fosse quello il problema, ma non si è mai riacceso. Ho contattato l'azienda per assistenza e ho ricevuto un semplice avviso che poiché il prodotto aveva superato la garanzia, potevano offrirmi uno sconto del 15% sul loro sito web. Non valeva davvero la pena dedicarmi del tempo, dato che posso ottenere qualcosa di più economico e con la spedizione gratuita su Amazon. Sono super deluso dal prodotto.
